    • createLobby

      private void createLobby​(java.lang.String newLobbyName, int numOfPlayers, User currentUser)
      Create a new lobby, adds the user to it and sets his status to "IN_LOBBY"
      Parameters:
      newLobbyName - name of the lobby that i want to create
      numOfPlayers - max number of players that the new lobby can have
      currentUser - the user that will be owner of the lobby
